collection.name: FlexiPod X11
collection.description: Compact tripod for shooting on the go. Specifications: Adjustable legs, light weight.

technical.material: The material for the compact tripod for shooting on the go consists of aluminum. This material provides light weight and good durability, making it easy to carry the tripod and hold the camera steady while shooting.

collection.name: UltraTripod S90
collection.description: Flexible tripod for non-standard angles. Flexible legs, easy use.

technical.material: It has legs made of rubber-coated and silicone material that provides flexibility. This allows you to fix the tripod on various surfaces, such as tree branches or railings, and create unusual angles for shooting.

collection.name: ProStance X1
collection.description: A compact stand for shooting at home. Stable table mount and minimalist design that blends in perfectly with any interior.

technical.material: It is made of plastic or metal. It is sturdy and resistant to the table to prevent the camera from falling while shooting.

collection.name: CamFlex 340T
collection.description: A tripod with high stability for professional shooting. Adjustable height, wind resistance, durable materials, high stability.

technical.material: Made of durable materials, aluminum and magnesium alloy. The tripod legs have adjustable height for different shooting conditions.
